Voice of the All-Spirit.name: Voice of the All-Spirit
Voice of the All-Spirit.flavor: Your attack resonates with the voice of the All-Spirit, rendering your foes prone for future attacks.
Voice of the All-Spirit.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier thunder damage, and the target falls prone. The target is deafened and marked until the end of your next turn.

Form of the All-Spirit.name: Form of the All-Spirit
Form of the All-Spirit.flavor: Your body becomes a miasma of primal spirits encompassing animal, plant, weather, and elemental aspects in equal parts. Your new form reaches out to your allies and strikes at your foes.
Form of the All-Spirit.effect: Before the attack, you teleport your speed.
Form of the All-Spirit.requirement: The power Form of the All-Spirit must be active in order to use this power.
Form of the All-Spirit.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is dominated until the end of your next turn.
Form of the All-Spirit.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

All-Spirit Step.name: All-Spirit Step
All-Spirit Step.flavor: The All-Spirit beckons to your enemies as you slip out of trouble.
All-Spirit Step.effect: You mark each enemy adjacent to you and then teleport your speed. You must end this teleport adjacent to at least one enemy you marked with this power.
